com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout
Class FlowLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Layout
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.FlowLayout

public class FlowLayout
extends Layout

Layout that positions its children using normal HTML layout behavior. The margin and spacing can be specified. The layout method will be called to any child widgets that are containers. Recalculate will be called on any child widgets that are components.

Field Summary
 int margin
          The number of pixels of margin that will be placed along the edges of the layout (default is 0).
 boolean removePositioning
          True to remove postioning from the container's children (defaults to true).
 int spacing
          The number of pixels between the edge of one cell and the edge of its neighbouring cell (default value is 0).

extraStyle, monitorWindowResize, renderHidden, resizeDelay

          Creates a new flow layout.
